front.title: IEEE Standard for Environmental Assessment of Imaging Equipment - Amendment 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The following three criteria: Required--End-of-life processing requirements (currently 4.6.2.1); Optional--Manufacturer recyclers or reuses toner material collected through its cartridge and container take-back program (currently 4.9.3.2); and Optional--Manufacturer recyclers or reuses plastics collected through its cartridge and container take-back program (currently 4.9.3.3) are revised in this amendment.
